https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qXDlsKrQ1IqqECVuFwHft1bGajY.jpg Narcolepsy and an uncontrollable bladder collide in a meeting only the universe could orchestrate. Kate and Andy have something in common as their problems guide them through lifes biggest mysteries. Love, happiness and a rare bond help them escape the harsh realities of life and open them up to the world of the imperfect. Andy Made a Friend
